Name: Jack Maples
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of optionally dust with cinnamon powder or cinnamon powder rim.
Review: Maple syrup smooths apple brandy, even as it enhances its character.
Nutrition: One serving of Jack Maples contains 176 calories
